titleStmt.title: OXFORD AND CAMBRIDGE ISLAMIC MANUSCRIPTS CATALOGUE ONLINE

msContents.summary: 36 works by 3 authors on the subjects of Sufism, Aphorisms and apothegms, Koran, Hadith, Worldliness, Grace, Gratitude, Patience, Alchemy, Military ethics, Islam, Medicine, Death, Mahdi, Islamic eschatology, Islamic ethics, and Faith

author.persName: Muttaqī, ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd al-Malik, d. 1567

msItem.title: al-Burhān al-jalī fī maʻrifat al-walī
msItem.note: ff. iv-iv blank; f. vr list of contents of MS.; vv blank

author.persName: ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī, d. 1166

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions).
